articles.author: Oren Liebermann, Kevin Liptak
articles.title: US to accelerate delivery of tanks to Ukraine - CNN
articles.description: The US will dramatically accelerate the time it takes to ship Abrams tanks to Ukraine by sending older M1-A1 models of America's main battle tank instead of the more modern version of the tank, according to two US officials.
